name: Moontachi Gaiden (Graphic Novel)
nutshell:
(Please read from left to right)
When the sun leaves, the moon shall rise! One fateful summer, a chef gets a ragtag team involved in his shady schemes.
Wanting to be like the Great Moon, Alistor yearns for an adventure
outside his everyday life. Till one fateful day, Mr. Rare crosses
into his path and grants his wish.  Now he must survive the countless demons that are attacking his world, but with help from a money-hungry chef named Bamboo, he gets to experience a hilarious adventure of a lifetime.
Determined to make a name for themselves, our heroes become aggravated as unexpected factors enter into the conflict. Yet with all the crazy problems they face, everything comes tied towards one goal; a treasure waiting to be uncovered.
For better or worse, follow their bodacious tokusatsu adventure as the world that humanity once knew evolves into something extraordinary.

name: Prince Game
nutshell: Shin Woo and Joon Hee are neighbours. Shin Woo is very handsome and popular and Joon Hee resigns herself to the fate of only being a friend to him…

name: Amai Kimi ga Suki
nutshell:
Amai Kimi ga Suki
Kawakami is a top student with a penchant for donuts. Kaji is a troublemaker who fell deeply in love with Kawakami. Although they ignore each other at school, when they're all alone… they eat, kiss and… play. “You're so annoying!” is Kawakami's favorite line, but there's much more than meets the eye. A cute story of an unusual first love!


Rising from the Ashes, Kaji-kun
Amai Kimi ga Suki extra


Dangan Baby
Once again Noda has been rejected by his one-sided crush. As he tries to drink his heartbreak away, he gets picked on. Unexpectedly, a stranger comes to his rescue. The next morning, he wakes up naked in an unknown bed and catches a glimpse into his savior's half-open suitcase: There he spots - a gun…? Just who is this mysterious stranger?


Let's go wild, Baby
Dangan Baby extra


The Kitten and the Prince / The Cat and the King
Oosado works as a researcher on pheromones and keeps Goro, a giant pet cat, at his laboratory. Most people keep away from him because of his cat. Only the medical student Tojo gets along with Goro splendidly. Why is it that Oosado always feels irritated by the animal-attracting lad?


Telephone!
Maki is very shy when it comes to answering phone calls. To cure his phone phobia, his superior Sasamoto decides to call his house phone every day. Soon Maki's anxiety fades - and he begins to anticipate the calls…?


Beautiful Thing / Beloved
Sugita is staying in the hospital because of his broken leg. A regular Japanese hospital if it weren't for his attending physician, Dr Yamada. The bright blonde beauty of a doctor seems to stick out like a sore thumb in Sugita's perception. That is until he witnesses an exchange between Dr Yamada and one of his collegues…


Your Favorite Song
Atsurou has inherited the piano-tuning skills from his renowned grandfather and so far, business has been going well. That is until he receives a much anticioated request from the Benriya house to fix their antique piano. No matter what he does, the piano's young owner cannot be satisfied with his piano-tuning. Just what is wrong with this piano and its owner…?


After
Your Favorite Song extra


Note: The scanlator combined chapters 2 & 3 into one chapter, and did the same with chapters 4 & 5. He then renumbered the remaining chapters.

name: Azur Lane - Tekketsu no Graf Zeppelin Atsumori (Doujinshi)
Yuutousei no Mondai
nutshell: 成山高校2年生・稲葉明（いなばあきら）は、品行方正・成績優秀で次期生徒会長候補。教員からの信頼も厚く、かつ明るく気さくな人柄から同級生からも慕われていた。しかし、そんな彼にも由々しき問題があった…………。

name: 22xx
nutshell: About a robot, Jack, who appears frequently in Shimizu's SF stories. He's a robot with very human-like psyche and he once believed that he was human and he can even consume food, unlike many of the other robots of those times. However, a cruel incident opened his eyes to the truth and he decided to perform bounty-hunting duties on a strange planet. That's where he meets Ruby, who turns into an innocent-looking youngster and a beautiful and seducing woman at night… she's a Photuris - a human tribe that preys on other humans in order to survive…

name: Kokui no Mure
nutshell: A high school teacher, Shirai Narumi, can't forget about his high school love who died in an accident. Unexpectedly, at the beginning of a new school year a student, who looks just like his dead love appears…

name: Replay
nutshell: Karam's new teacher, Mr. Lee, is also her mother's new boarder. Why does he seem so interested in Karam, and why does she feel some strange connection to him? This is a story of past and present lives, love, jealousy, sacrifice, and salvation.

name: Don’t Touch Me!
nutshell:
Changning Xiao, the beautiful grand princess of the imperial dynasty, was suddenly married off... to a eunuch?! The empress dowager has held control ever since Changning’s parents died and promised her to this leader of an enemy faction, in a plot to both humiliate her and get a pawn on the inside. It’s already bad enough that Changning used to make fun of him in the past, but with the powerful empress dowager on one side and the infamously cold and bloodthirsty (yet handsome!!) eunuch on the other, will Changing make it through and survive?
Official English on Tapas

name: Mad Chimera World
nutshell: Set in a ruined world overrun with chimerical creatures where the female creatures eat the males. Two creatures explore the land: Usagi, the elder sister, protects her brother Mitsuki, a curious chronicler who is able to read the books in their secret hiding place to know that the world was once different.

name: The Tale of Princess Atsu
nutshell: Chaos reigns as the curtain descends on the age of the samurai. Atsuhime, born to the Satsuma branch of the Shimazu clan is to wed Iesada Tokugawa, the 13th shogun. However, soon after their marriage, Atsuhime’s beloved husband dies, leaving her to defend the clan as she is tossed about by the waves of history. Watch as this exceptional woman from Satsuma lives out a trouble-filled life while resolutely moving forward no matter what in this moving historical comic!

name: Paradox Live Stage Battle "Comic"
nutshell:
In the near future, the Phantom Live movement was born anew from the incredible saturation of hip-hop culture. Rappers have accessories containing a metallic substance called Phantom Metal. Through chemical reactions with their own DNA, they create illusions linked to their emotions, driving young people wild with spectacular stage shows. But behind the scenes, some are suffering from their reactions to these trauma illusions.
Amid all this, four teams of immense popularity in their respective musical genres—BAE, The Cat's Whiskers, cozmez, and Akan'yatsura—take part in the mysterious Paradox Live contest at the legendary CLUB Paradox.
To prove their music is the best, 14 performers will take to the stage to battle.
As light and shadow clash, a frenzied stage battle of illusions is about to commence.
(Source: Paradox Live official website)

name: Angels' Wings
nutshell: A short, all-color manga of two friends playing make-believe.

name: Coffee Mou Ippai
nutshell: This is a 5-volume manga series comprised of individual short stories that all have to do with coffee one way or other. Each of them is bittersweet with a philosophical bent.

name: I’m Looking for the Princess
nutshell:
The one “who operated a Hong Sin Seo for 10 years”, who shudders at the monthly rent, Na Baek Su, dives a 1 million dollar project, The Search for a Princess!!
For money, she’ll do anything!! she who says that money, money, and more money is the best, Suh Jan Di.
To help her uncle, Na Baek Su, she joined the Search for a Princess…
Her princess candidates list shows a couple of people…
Cold, charismatic, the one who’ll go down in the history of the fashion world, Yu Jin.
The one who’d even sell the Sameun group for the money-crazed girl, Eun hyuk.
A wingless angel’s infinite love, our eternal goddess, fashion model Eh Eun.
A love story that outrageously intertwines the princess candidates and Suh Jan Di, with lots of trouble and excitement!

name: Touhou - Hoshi ni Negai o, Anata ni Watashi o. (Doujinshi)
Metamorphose no Engawa
nutshell: A 75-year old widow becomes enamored with the cover of a BL manga. This becomes her entryway into the world of Boys' Love manga.

name: They Who Made Me Fall In Love
nutshell: Zhuang Yu, who was originally a rich second-generation but aspiring to become a generation of otaku, wakes up and finds himself sleeping on an isolated island, and suddenly four beauties appear in front of him, which upsets Zhuang who has feminine phobias. What Yu felt terrified was that four beauties were scrambling to have a baby with him.

name: San Yan Xiao Tian Lu
tags: Genderswap,Action,Long Strip,Romance,Comedy,Boys' Love,School Life,Fantasy,Web Comic,Supernatural,Full Color
nutshell:
The heavenly general Yang Jian, also known as god Erlang Shen, was ordered to descend to the mortal realm for the task of get rid of demons and evil spirits.
After he woke up in the mortal realm, he noticed that Taishang Laojun who was in charge of his transfer absused his power and reincarnated Yang Jian as a woman.
Yang Jian is not used to this new body and to make things more worse it seems that he can't use his full power. now he must learn to adapt to modern society and take care of a hidden danger that is going to put the whole world into chaos.

name: Urami-san wa Kyou mo Ayaui
nutshell: Haruto Satou who is a 15 year old with a good personality, as well as good at sports. He had an important childhood friend that could not be forgotten - one who was bright and active, Masuna Urami. Even though they meet again in High School, she had drastically changed…

name: Ashita Niji ga Denakute mo
nutshell: A gay man working as a drag queen is developing feelings for a seemingly heterosexual male online friend.

name: His Majesty's Proposal
nutshell: A broken engagement and one too many drinks are the catalysts for a mistake that will change Penelope Zecalion’s life forever, as she finds herself waking up in bed with the emperor! Grouchy, foul-mouthed Penelope is reluctant to let the emperor into her heart after her first engagement went so wrong. Can the emperor change her mind and win her heart?

name: Takane no Hana Senpai
nutshell: My childhood friend is the pheromone Prince.

name: Houkago, 2-C no Kyoushitsu de.
nutshell: It's the third in Araragi's yandere trap series after Hatsukoi Lovers and Onii-chan Complex. In it, Yuuto Sasaki is a trap who forces his homeroom teacher Sasaki Tsukimori to spend some quality time after school, which usually entails Sasaki playing a domineering role over Tsukimori.

name: Yume no Shiro
nutshell:
Yume no Shiro is a one volume work by Masami Tsuda and consists of 3 short stories, that were drawn while Kare Kano was still running.
It's all about love couples. Also, there is a thread running through all three stories. That's a magician who helps the people. Who are the people he helps?


Inside the Forest
Sana loves the forest and is friends with the animals. However she is a noble's daughter that has been recently requested to be a concubine for a king due to the death of his previous concubine. Unwilling, she becomes his concubine, however she seems to have fallen in love, but he only loves his dead wife…


I'm a Mermaid
The island priestess discovers a golden-hair, blue eyed man that seems to be an enemy. However both fall in love…


The Castle of Dreams
Lord Lafense has enough of his life and decided to commit suicide by jumping off the castle wall, but it seems that his faithful servant Chita is dragged along with him. However, when they woke up, they found freedom in a dream-like castle. Are they really in the afterlife as they thought or is it something more..magical?

name: Otona no Koi no Hajimekata
nutshell:
"What an erotic face, don't be so greedy."
Shinoki has ended up working in the same company as his long-time rival from high school, Nagase. As usual, Nagase manages to catch everyone's attention, irritating the hell out of Shinoki. At a drinking get-together with their colleagues, Shinoki ends up wasted and is sent off to a hotel where he spends the night with Nagase and gets fucked?!

name: Jumbo Max
nutshell:
Tateo Sone runs a pharmacy in Odawara and leads an ordinary but happy life with his beautiful wife and daughter-in-law. One day, however, when his wife tells him she is pregnant, he is shocked. It's because he has a secret: he has never had a functioning lower half of his body. His wife's child is not his own...Tateo despairs at the thought. At that time, a man named Sumaoka happens to give him a mysterious ED drug. Tateo impulsively takes the drug and is shocked to find that the function of his lower body miraculously recovers. Tateo declares to Sumaoka that he will recreate and make this medicine himself. But this is the beginning of a dangerous day that will change his life forever!
(Source: Big Comic, translated)

name: The Secret of the Boy Who Sits Next to Me
nutshell: A girl who hates almost all the boys in her school finds out that the one who sits next to her is a crossdresser she's obsessed with.

name: Mahoutsukai no Konyakusha ~Eternally Yours~
nutshell:
After being involved in an accident in her former world, Filimina reincarnated into the world of sword and magic. The one who stayed beside her in this new world, was the unsociable handsome young boy with enormous magic power, Eguiedills.
Time goes by, Eguiedills is now the Head of Royal Magician and Filimina is his wife. After unraveling the mystery behind the origins of Filimina's nightmares, they both are living their happily married life, but…a new encounter seems to bring some more trouble to their life!?
The super popular Love Fantasy from Iris NEO, the comic version of the new arc now available on ZEROSUM Online!
